coreAtributes.authorTag: Carefuly etched into the back of the wing reads "CAREFULY FORGED BY TROOPS #P01-Y & #B100-M "
coreAtributes.name: Bat wing barrette
coreAtributes.description: A black steel barrette issued by the imperial military for the soldiers that cant keep hair out of their eyes. Its modeled after an imperial bat's wing.

displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s barrette and [npc.verb(flick)] it to the side.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your barrette and [npc.verb(flick)] it to the side.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s barrette and [npc.verb(flick)] it to the side.

replacementText.playerSelf: You clip the barrette to your hair.
replacementText.playerNPC: You clip the barrette onto [npc.name]'s hair.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force [npc.her] to wear the barrette.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] clips the barrette in your hair.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] forces the barrette onto your hair.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces the barrette in [npc2.her] hair.
